title: A Contract with God and Other Tenement Stories
description: "Eisner was not only ahead of his times; the present times are still catching up to him."--John UpdikeA revolutionary novel, A Contract with God re-creates the neighbourhood of Will Eisner's youth through a quartet of four interwoven stories. Expressing the joy, exuberance, tragedy, and drama of life on the mythical Dropsie Avenue of the Bronx, A Contract with God is a monumental achievement, a must in the library of any graphic novel fan.
author: Will Eisner
